info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: You Must Be Happy
collection.openText: Many of those who underwent an operation inside the machine have found themselves rested and healthy again.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When an employee uses the machine, they will experience an increase in all their stats.
The stats will increase greater the longer the machine is used.
Be sure to stop the machine only when it displays “YES”. If it is stopped while on “NO”, all the stats will drop as much as they were due to increase.
The increased stats will return to normal the next day. However, employees who’ve gained more than 200 points in their stats will vanish the next day.
<Caution> There once was an incident where an employee who used the machine for 5 times or more in a single day exploded on the spot.
